title: BLUE ENSSENCE
body: I had 4000 plus the 3 reimbursements were 7400 blue essence and I closed the game hours later I'm going to see it play and I have 190 blue essence so I'm very angry with that because I made a lot of effort for that*****{{sticker:darius-angry}}

replies.body: I looked into this and actually saw a few random purchases that were immediately refunded, which can typically mean someone was able to hack into your account without you realizing it. Reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to verify you were the one who created the account, and after that they should be able to repair any of that damage.
